error.message: Call to deprecated function drupal_get_path(). Deprecated in drupal:9.3.0 and is removed from drupal:10.0.0. Use Drupal\Core\Extension\ExtensionPathResolver::getPath() instead.
Call to deprecated function drupal_get_path(). Deprecated in drupal:9.3.0 and is removed from drupal:10.0.0. Use Drupal\Core\Extension\ExtensionPathResolver::getPath() instead.

Parameter $mime_type_guesser of method Drupal\crop_image\Plugin\Field\FieldWidget\ImageBrowserCropWidget::__construct() has typehint with deprecated interface Symfony\Component\HttpFoundation\File\MimeType\MimeTypeGuesserInterface: since Symfony 4.3, use {@link MimeTypesInterface} instead
Value of core_version_requirement: ^8 || ^9 is not compatible with the next major version of Drupal core. See https://drupal.org/node/3070687.
